direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage URL protocols for attributes but in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).
Both methods involve adding configurations to tags, with similar control flows and validation checks.
Both methods manage attributes for tags but in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).
Both methods involve adding specific configurations to tags, with similar control flows and validation checks.
Both methods manage enforced attributes for tags but in opposite directions (adding vs. removing).
The addProtocols method indirectly affects the behavior of isSafeAttribute by modifying the allowed protocols.
The addProtocols method directly influences the protocols tested by testValidProtocol, which is used in attribute validation.
Both methods involve configuring the behavior of URL handling, though they address different aspects (protocols vs. relative links).
